DataElement.preferredName: Wegener's Granulomatosis Involvement Primary Transplantation Reason Yes No Character Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A multisystem disease chiefly affecting males, characterized by necrotizing granulomatous vasculitis involving the upper and lower respiratory tracts, glomerulonephritis, and variable degrees of systemic, small vessel vasculitis, which is generally considered to represent an aberrant hypersensitivity reaction to an unknown antigen. (Dorland, 27th ed)_To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action._Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A multisystem disease chiefly affecting males, characterized by necrotizing granulomatous vasculitis involving the upper and lower respiratory tracts, glomerulonephritis, and variable degrees of systemic, small vessel vasculitis, which is generally considered to represent an aberrant hypersensitivity reaction to an unknown antigen. (Dorland, 27th ed)_To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A multisystem disease chiefly affecting males, characterized by necrotizing granulomatous vasculitis involving the upper and lower respiratory tracts, glomerulonephritis, and variable degrees of systemic, small vessel vasculitis, which is generally considered to represent an aberrant hypersensitivity reaction to an unknown antigen. (Dorland, 27th ed):To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: A rare, autoimmune, systemic medium and small size vasculitis. It is characterized by the formation of necrotizing granulomas in the respiratory tract, necrotizing angiitis, and glomerulonephritis.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original. (American Heritage Dictionary):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was the involvement associate
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the involvement associated with wegener granulomatosis the primary reason for transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2749978
ReferenceDocuments.description: "[IF EXISTS THEN ""true"" ELSE ""false""] PerformedDiagnosis [primary] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation [assessment] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedDiagnosis.resultClassificationCode(ANY=>CD).originalText [secondary] WHERE  PerformedDiagnosis.value [primary] = ""wegener granulomatosis"" AND PerformedDiagnosis.resultClassificationCode [secondary] = {specified disorder} AND PerformedDiagnosis [primary] > PerformedProcedure [overall HCT process] AND PerformedObservation [assessment] > PerformedClinicalInterpretation.value = ""Involvement""  AND PerformedObservation [assessment] > DefinedObservation.nameCode = ""Assess Involvement"" AND PerformedSubstanceAdministration.reasonCode = ""Diagnosis of wegener granulomatosis with Involvement"""
